channel.title: Blog entries on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blog entries on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Web journey so far
item.description: My fascination for building on the web has been going on for a while. Many years ago I build my first project for the web. It was a wordpress travel blog that required very little technical knowledge and mainly served as way to update my family and friends. From python to the web After diving deeper and deeper into the python world throughout my studies of physics and machine learning, I started to give the web another go.

item.title: Building a site with hugo
item.description: I thought the best way to get this blog started would be to let you know how it was created. My goal for this website was to have an extended CV that I could share quickly and to have a place on the web to share my experiences. My fist thought was wordpress. While I have no experience using wordpress I know that it is very widely used and I like that it provides a cheap open-source way to the web.
